summary: This cable discusses an agent ASG's message regarding the retrieval of a pouch, the potential exfiltration of 'IMINA SILIO', and a pick-up from 'MANOLO (DIEGO)' in Mexico. It also includes information for the Director only, identifying individuals like EMILIO as EXILIO CARBO, TONY as ARCANOE-3, JUDE as ARRIPE-2, and MANOLO (DIEGO) as a relative of ASGIPE-1.
title: Classified Message Regarding Agent ASG and Related Operations
